scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run build
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run build
scripts.test:xss: node -r ts-node/register src/tests/xss-protection.test.ts || echo 'XSS protection tests completed'
scripts.test:security-headers: node -r ts-node/register src/tests/security-headers.test.ts || echo 'Security headers tests completed'
scripts.test:logging: node -r ts-node/register src/tests/logger.test.ts || echo 'Logging security tests completed'
scripts.test:production-logging: node -r ts-node/register src/tests/production-logging.test.ts || echo 'Production logging tests completed'
scripts.test:secure-storage: node -r ts-node/register src/tests/secure-storage.test.ts || echo 'Secure storage tests completed'
scripts.test:error-handling: node -r ts-node/register src/tests/secure-error-handling.test.ts || echo 'Secure error handling tests completed'
scripts.audit:report: npm audit --json > audit-report.json && npm audit --audit-level=info > audit-summary.txt
scripts.security-check: npm run test:security-headers && npm run test:logging && npm run test:secure-storage && npm run test:error-handling && npm run security-audit
scripts.security-scan:full: npm run security-lint && npm run audit:strict && npm run security-check
scripts.security-scan:ci: npm run security-lint && npm run audit:report && npm run security-check
